item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In A)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, Bm, E, D, D#
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Memory from "Cats" - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: A, F-sharp minor, D, C-sharp minor, Bm, E, F#, B, F, Dm, Bb, Am, G, C, Em (Starts in the key of A, ends in the key of C).
Memory from the musical “Cats” by Andrew Lloyd Webber. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. I just added chords to the lyric video created by YouTuber Miyanoe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Tim McGraw - Live Like You Were Dying
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: The first two verses are in the key of G and uses G, C, Em, D, and 1 B7. The third verse is in the key of A and uses A, D, Gbm, E, and 1 C#.
Live Like You Were Dying by Tim McGraw. It’s the official lyric video, I just added the ukulele chords.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Anthony Gonzalez - Un Poco Loco
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Un Poco Loco on the ukulele by Anthony Gonzalez and Gael Garcia Bernal. The chords used are G C D A D E.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Barenaked Ladies - If I Had $1,000,000
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A. Original Key.
As performed by the Barenaked Ladies.
The first video play along I created was published on February 15, 2017 was "If I Had a Million Dollars." https://youtu.be/HgiIcjZWGhw. Over the last two years, I have created over 350 play along files (and well over 600 videos). While this song isn't my favorite song, I liked it, and since I have changed how I make videos over these past two years (originally on my Mac, then on my iPad) I wanted to re-make that first video. I also created a version in the original key (a little tricky for ukulele) and Baritone version as well.
Recently the Barenaked Ladies performed with Melanie Doane and her ukulele program in Toronto, which adds another ukulele to this song (not directly, but with the group). https://youtu.be/rsmnykNk-4I
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song posted as a play along.

item.title: Anthony Hamilton - Freedom
item.description: From the motion picture Django Unchained Performed by Anthony Hamilton & Elayna Boynton.

item.title: benny blanco - Eastside
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Eastside on the ukulele by Halsey, Khalid, and Benny Blanco. The chords used are A D E F#m. (original key)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Randy Travis - Forever and Ever, Amen
Ed Sheeran - The A Team
item.description:
Ukulele play along
The A Team - Ed Sheeran
Using the chords: A Bm7 D E F#m (I have simplified the chord progressions in a few places)
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU works but it is worth try a few.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Beach Boys - Good Vibrations
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G (well, it ends in G)
As performed by The Beach Boys.
Here’s a chance to practice Bb and E.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.
